page.title: 02FELTHAM'S FUTURE
page.content: The councils plans for the future of Feltham for the next 10 years are to establish a framework for controlled expansion of housing and industries together with an improved and effective Green Belt for use by local people for recreation,conservation and other outdoor activities. These policies include: supplying new land for houses; a new look to the Green Belt with boundary changes, landscaping , recreational schemes, space for conservation of wildlife and the protection of farms; modernisation of industry and new land for industry; more emphasis on routes for walkers and cyclists; new premises for community activities.
